Frank Vaughan Address: 12, Cintra Close                          Date of Birth: 4/1/1962        R e a d i n g ,                  Mobile: 07807679566                  RG2 7AL                            Email: frankvaughan@btinternet.com Profile A proficient, senior sales professional with 30 year’s experience of enterprise solution selling into the finance, service provider, insurance and pharmaceuticals industries. A model sales professional with proven leadership experience, while leveraging all skills and experience across the extended team. Excellent interpersonal, relationship building and presentation skills, coupled with a hands-on approach. Overall, an ambassador for the company he represents and motivated for continued success. Track record of overachievement, majority of career in Frank Vaughan Address: 12, Cintra Close                          Date of Birth: 4/1/1962        R e a d i n g ,                  Mobile: 07807679566                  RG2 7AL                            Email: frankvaughan@btinternet.com Profile A proficient, senior sales professional with 30 year’s experience of enterprise solution selling into the finance, service provider, insurance and pharmaceuticals industries. A model sales professional with proven leadership experience, while leveraging all skills and experience across the extended team. Excellent interpersonal, relationship building and presentation skills, coupled with a hands-on approach. Overall, an ambassador for the company he represents and motivated for continued success. Track record of overachievement, majority of career in hi/po top 15%.     Principal Achievements •Define and execute strategy for global team for major bank, grew revenues y/y by 16% (F5 Networks)  •1st ever winner of salesman of the year 2011 (Brocade) accepted the award on behalf of the team •Excellence Award, 212% of network plan for first half of FY13 (Brocade) – thanks as always to the team •Sold an innovative Capacity on Demand solution to leading UK insurance company worth $12.8M (EMC) •Turned around soured relationship within 6 months and won SAP solution sale of $4M into an Industry-leading pharmaceutical company (Sun Microsystems) Palo Alto Networks           2019-current Senior Client Executive  •Manage a portfolio of named and new business accounts •Provided detailed analysis to underpin plan and account strategy •Leverage all member of the virtual team to deliver customer confidence and product preference  •Engage a C-Level to seek assurances on major security investment due to compliance needs F5 Networks            2017 to 2019 Senior, Global Client Director •Chosen to take the lead on the number 1 account in Europe, top 10 globally  •Assisted with forging the CEO & Chairman relationship with CTO at major global bank   •Work with selected global strategic partners to develop tailored value proposition •Set the strategy and direction with input from global team, provide 1-1 coaching and leadership •Engage with c-level internal execs and stake holders to restore confidence at c-level in major bank •Maintained position in hi/po 10% in role     Check Point Software Technologies         2015 to 2017 Global Account Director, Finance & Banking •Engage President and c-level execs to get back on track within major global bank •Drive collaboration determine strategy to grown revenues 27% y/y •Engage strategic partners to share plans and agree direction to drive sales growth •Share vision with management and execs to improve cross geo’s sales engagements •Recognised for being ‘bold’ and ‘tenacious’ with challenging customers to drive opportunities  •20 years’ experience of stakeholder management with partners at senior management level •Achieved $2.1M YTD revenue Citrix Systems             2014 to 2015 Senior Networking Sales Specialist, Finance & Banking •Driving attach rate and pure play Cloud Networking Portfolio into major Finance customers •Aligned to ERM to deliver compelling reasons and customer preference for NetScaler and CloudBridge •Working with strategic partners to identify key projects, adapt proposition and overall team sell •Present detailed business plans to management on activities and projects to retire quota BROCADE Communications UK Ltd         2010 to 2014 Global Account Director  •Joined to lead sales activity into major broadcast company, number one IP networking customer •Promoted within 6 months to Global Account Director for major international bank (126% of target) •Secured sole vendor position for high profile SAN Remediation Project  •Mentor, coach, go-to for sales advice and support to graduates  •Hosted key c-level executives for formal technology briefings at worldwide HQ  COMPUWARE            2008 to 2009 Senior New Business Account Manager 
•Established complex product focus, built pipeline (£600K) ahead of plan •Closed $400K of product and services revenue 2 months earlier than required to support revenue need •Sold product portfolio management software into territory against established competition CISCO             2006 to 2008 Territory Global Account Manager •Achieved 144% UK revenue on $3.5M target year 1 •Achieved 102% UK revenue on $7.2M target year 2 •Planned and executed sales strategy with key solution partner to ensure customer satisfaction •Secured major bank agreement to discuss their confidential innovation plans, a first for Cisco •Key contributor to global team on plans, direction and strategy for account MICROSOFT            2005 to 2006 System Management Sales Specialist •Achieved 105% performance on $1.2M target •Delivered strategy and direction to named strategic customers within finance •Planned and delivered customer/partner seminar with guest corporate speakers to 75 attendees HEWLETT-PACKARD           2003 to 2005 Storage Solutions Sales Specialist (New Business) •Achieved 153% performance on joint $5.4M target (FY03 H2 only) •Achieved 88% performance on joint $9.2M target (FY04 H1 only) HEWLETT-PACKARD (Continued)          •Achieved 143% performance on joint $4.9M target (FY04 H2 only) •Sold storage solutions to finance and insurance customers •Leveraged key partners for increased account coverage and to underline uniqueness of solution •Trained account managers on business drivers and competitive awareness •Provided training to internal sales to better qualify opportunities and target new prospects EMC COMPUTER SYSTEMS           2001 to 2003 Account Director •Achieved 115% performance on $13.4M target •Team leader for sales, technical support and consultants aligned to primary account •Initiated web presence on customer intranet (unique and exclusive to EMC) to automate (grow) sales •Organised and hosted senior executive technology briefings to reinforce EMC’s market leadership ORACLE (SUN MICROSYSTEMS)         1996 to 2001 Account Manager •Achieved 115% performance on $8.3M target •Achieved 100% performance on $19M target •Delivered 78% performance on $16M target (for 8 months (66% of period only) •Sold products and services into to both OEM and End User channels Global Account Manager •Achieved 120% performance on $13.4M target •Influenced global technology decisions, Sun’s largest pharmaceutical account •Recruitment of sales graduates, mentor and coach •Forged personal relationship with customer CIO, presented Sun capability to global conference New Business Territory Account Manager •Achieved 147% performance on $7.2M target •Sold into portfolio of tier 1 pharmaceutical companies DELL COMPUTER CORPORATION          1994 to 1996 Account Director •Achieved 200% performance on $800K target •Achieved 120% performance on $1.9M target •Sales Executive for major high street bank and exceed sales quotas 
DIGITAL EQUIPMENT COMPANY         1981 to 1993 •Sales Account Manager •UK Wide Area Network Manager •Selected and successfully completed 6 months Intensive Sales Training Program    Education:  City and Guild Diploma in IT Sales, A-level Art, GCE O-levels and CSE qualifications    Personal:    Two wonderful children (Elliott 21 & Iona 19) with a clean driving licence    Interests:    Road cycling, music, cooking, gym work and overall fitness
